name: Bike Bazar
subtitle: A simple motorcycle shop
overview: This is a single-page application.
On this site, the homepage has several sections like Header, Banner, Products, Counter, contact, and review.
The footer and header occur on several pages so that it locates the share component.
In the homepage product section, you can select an item, and then it goes to the booking page.
The booking page is only for login users.
You can book an item from the booking page. After booking, you can see your all order on the dashboard.
The dashboard is only visible for login users.
You can register or log in only using email and password.
In the dashboard page, there are several child pages that occur. Some sub-pages are protected for admin.
An admin can make admin another user. Admin can approve orders, delete orders, add new products and set the role of the user.
The about page carries the about of the site.
The site is responsive for mobile and desktop.

name: Travel BD
subtitle: A simple MERN stack travel agency site
overview: This is a travel agency site
On this site, you can select a service and take a tour of beautiful places in Bangladesh
On the homepage of the site, the header, the service section, the tour agent section, and the contact section are located
You can book any service by clicking on the button book now
Then it goes to the route booking page and you can book the item providing your address and phone number
After booking the service, you can manage the service on my order page
You can delete the service
When the admin is approved, the status will be approved
Primary it pending
And the interesting part of the site is managing all orders page
Now it can access all users
It will be the admin part of the site
It can manage the order, can be approved, and delete the order and service
On the other page is Insert Item
On this page, you can add a new service, that can show on the homepage
It will be the admin page
The non-login user can only access the home page and about page
Another page can not be accessed by the nonlogin user
This is a single-page application is created by the most powerful javascript library that's name is react
The design part of the site is helping the react-bootstrap and raw CSS
Sometimes used the react font awesome, react hooks form
On the routing part of the site, I use the react-router-dom
For authentication, I use the firebase that provides by google
For the other part of the backend service, I used the express js, MongoDB, and MongoDB atlas for storing the database
At least I host the server part hosting the Heroku site and set the URL on my website

name: Online School
subtitle: MERN stack online course application
overview: This is a simple online school site
In there are some courses that are shown on the homepage and service page
On the homepage, only 4 items are shown
The al item of course is shown on the service page
On the view course button, you can directly to the individual course and the details
You can find the enroll now button, you can click on this button
No money is needed
This site making by react js
React js is a powerful javascript library for single-page applications
For design purposes, I used the react-CSS framework as react-bootstrap
Then I used some raw CSS to customize the design of some components
This site is made on the basis of react-router
React router helps render specific components on the specific area without reloading the page
I used the hook of react-router-dom like as useParams, useHistory
To change the route instantly and show the specific item, I use the useParams hooks and show details of the specific item
This is a very simple site
I hope you enjoy it

name: Jonota Clinic
subtitle: A medical Clinic Website
overview: This site is a medical website named jonota clinic
This site is an imagination medical center
The data are note-related on the site
This data are collected on google
This site has some pages
Like as home, about us, contact us, specialist and so on
The navbar and footer are common on all page of the site
In the homepage, the header section, the service section, the gallery section, and the review section are located
The service section has a button, you can click on this button, and see the all details of the service
The gallery section has some interesting images that are related to the site
The interesting part of this site is the review section
In this section, I use a carousel and show the data of a specific user
On the site I made the most powerful javascript library name is react
This is a single-page website
I applied the multiple-page behavior using react-router-dom
It is a very interesting thing on the react application
On the site, the service details page is private
You cannot see the service details page without a login
On this site, the login and sign-up the system are applied
The system applied I use the firebase
For the overall design I used react-bootstrap and raw CSS
Sometimes I use the bootstrap class to apply some design
The site is responsive for mobile and desktop

name: Red Onion Food
subtitle: A restaurant web application
overview: This is a simple restaurant app
It is created by the powerful javascript library react js
In this app, the homepage has some items that are divided into 3 categories
A user selects a category and selects the food for order
The select item is added to the cart
The total price and select item are shown on the header
The user can change or remove the item quantity to the order review page
Users can process to ship after login
Then the user gives some information and submits the order

name: Product Management Inventory
subtitle: Team Project by Md. Bappy Mia, Md. Shahriar Mehedi, Farshid Ahsan and Farjana Akter
overview: Users will be able to login into an existing account or can create a new account
User accounts can be maintained through Firebase
Logged-in users can only see their products in the inventory
Based on login information, the dashboard will be updated
Users can log in or sign up using Google also
The user can see the dashboard panel after a successful log-in to his account
The dashboard panel contains information about users' uploaded product data
Users can edit or delete any entry and the dashboard will update accordingly
Logged-in users can add products in this section
The product input section will contain input fields like
Product name, Amount, Image, Weight/Measurement, price, etc
Data will store in the MongoDB database
Product entry can be edited or deleted by a logged-in user
Updating or deleting any product will immediately affect the product list and also affect the dashboard panel
